summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use, zoning and lots, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 23.22.100, 23.24.040, 23.24.046, 23.28.030, 23.41.012, 23.44.010, and 23.44.012, to require standards for configuration of platted lots, to add specific standards for development on lots qualifying for exceptions to minimum lot area standards in Single Family zones, and to clarify existing standards for structures eligible for unit lot subdivisions.
